channel.title: Can't connect
channel.description:
Using InsanityX client with Soulsplit's source, but getting an error when logging in.
[CODE] Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string : "%1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.getOrbValues(client.java:11317) at client.createOrbs(client.java:11269) at client.drawOrbs(client.java:11264) at client.drawMinimap(client.java:11458) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9381) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10550) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:159) at client.run(client.java:5336) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/CODE]

item.title: Can't connect
item.dc:creator: @turmoil-pk turmoil-pk
item.description:
@turmoil-pk wrote:

Is that how you deal with everything that comes across you? Just delete it and use something else…?

Read full topic

item.title: Can't connect
item.dc:creator: @BentonScape BentonScape
item.description:
@BentonScape wrote:

Client Sees The Source As Unknown You Should Use Either A Different Client Or Source
